alert.note: Alert for Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 9:14AM MST until March 05 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Total snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Flagstaff, Kachina Village, Parks and Williams. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, reduced visibility down to 1 mile or less, and minor snow loads on trees and power lines. Snow forecast from 11 AM Today to 11 PM Today: Doney Park 1 to 2 inches Flagstaff 3 to 5 inches Kachina Village 4 to 6 inches Parks 2 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
